content.body: In retrospect `[SameAs=href] USVString toString();` or some such might have been better
content.formatted_body: In retrospect [SameAs=href] USVString toString(); or some such might have been better

content.body: WebKit has something like that so you can implement getters that return the same thing once and it's lovely

https://twitter.com/robpalmer2/status/1658914059578744835 made me think of a similar request I had seen for `AbortSignal` but I can't find it. Something like `AbortSignal.withAborter() -> { signal, aborter }`.
